articles.title: Canadian U-18 women’s basketball team overpowers Mexico at Americas Championship
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina - Canada’s under-18 women’s basketball team tipped off the FIBA Americas Championship on Monday with a dominant 68-40 victory ...
articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES, Argentina - Canada’s under-18 women’s basketball team tipped off the FIBA Americas Championship on Monday with a dominant 68-40 victory against Mexico.

articles.title: Canada nets U18 bronze by dunking Argentina 81-57
articles.description: TIJUANA, Mexico — It wasn't the desired colour, but Canada's U18 men's basketball team earned a bronze medal Sunday by dunking Argentina 81-57 at the FIBA Americas Championship tournament.
articles.content:
